00033 int ResponseCallbackGetSchema::response(const char *schema) {
00034   CommHeader header;
00035   header.initialize_from_request_header(m_event_ptr->header);
00036   CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, 4 + encoded_length_vstr(schema)));
00037   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00038   cbp->append_vstr(schema);
00039   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00040 }
